description:
Eggs are very common and are been generally available at a nearby place, it is been consumed worldwide. Eggs contain protein, omega-3 enriched, loaded with antioxidants, and so on. 

Eating eggs on a regular basis helps in improving cholesterol, reducing heart disease risk, and many more, let's quickly look out at some of the health benefits of eating eggs:

details.full_description: Eggs are loaded with lots of nutrients like vitamins A and E also contain omega-3 fat, also eggs contain a decent amount of protein with good fat. Whole eggs are among the most nutritious food on this planet as they contain a little bit of every nutrient you need.

HDL stands for high-density lipoprotein which is also known as good cholesterol, high level of HDL lowers the risk of heart disease and strokes. Taking Eggs daily is a great way to increase your HDL(Good) cholesterol.

Eggs contain mainly two antioxidants which are lutein and zeaxanthin, studies show that consuming a decent amount of these antioxidants can significantly reduce the risk of cataracts and macular degeneration. Egg yolks contain a good amount of both antioxidants.
details.header: Loaded with Antioxidants that benefit eye health:

details.full_description: Studies show that consuming eggs that are rich in omega-3 is a very effective way to lower blood triglycerides, which is a well-known factor for heart disease.
Eggs are been an excellent source of protein with a single egg-containing approx. 6gm protein. eggs also contain essential amino acids so that your body makes full use of protein in them.
Studies have shown eating 2-3 eggs per day is perfectly okay. eggs are tasty and can be used with many foods and at last, it is cheap.

title: Health benefits of Eggs
